long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add educational pit stops to YouTube

With YouLearn, solve a math problem before watching a YouTube video.
YouLearn is designed for Grades K-3

Customize the Grade Level

The difficulty of the problem increases with a higher grade level.
Higher grades also have higher to more types of operations.

> 1st Grade unlocks subtraction. 
> 2nd Grade unlocks multiplication. 
> 3rd Grade unlocks division.
